ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 111
ygData.msgSnippet: ... If we took all the rumors and speculation off this list then it d be nothing but people whining about how tinkering sucks. :)
ygData.messageBody:
> PLEASE DONT EMAIL BULLSHIT ..................UNLESS YOU HAVE FACTS THEN EMAIL
> IT...... IF YOU DONT HAVE ANY FACTS THEN SHUT THE HELL UP

If we took all the rumors and speculation off this list then it'd be nothing but
people whining about how tinkering sucks. :)
